div.bibl: Onze Toekomst, Sep. 3, 1909. RE-UNION OF THE TON FAMILY

body.p: Last Thursday, the Ton Family held their usual annual re-union at Lansing, Illinois. The family now consists of 534 members. That is an increase of 33 over last year. Only one of those, who were counted last year was taken away by death, while the increase of 34 was due to births. The oldest member of the family is Mrs. Aggie Ton, the mother of the Honorable Cornelius J. Ton, a member of the Illinois State Legislature.
